subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. levied $50,000 in fines to the Pittsburgh Steelers and wide receiver Emmanuel Sanders for faking an injury in a game in Cincinnati.
snippet: The N.F.L. levied $50,000 in fines to the Pittsburgh Steelers and wide receiver Emmanuel Sanders for faking an injury in a game in Cincinnati.
